member.name: T:Base62.Base62Converter
member.summary: Encodes and decodes text to and from base62 encoding.

member.name: M:Base62.Base62Converter.#ctor(Base62.Base62Converter.CharacterSet)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of with the provided .

member.name: M:Base62.Base62Converter.Encode(System.String)
member.summary: Encodes the input text to Base62 format.

member.name: M:Base62.Base62Converter.Decode(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes the input text from Base62 format.

member.name: M:Base62.Base62Converter.Encode(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encodes the input bytes to Base62 format.

member.name: M:Base62.Base62Converter.Decode(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decodes the input bytes from Base62 format.

member.name: M:Base62.Base62Converter.BaseConvert(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts source byte array from the source base to the destination base.

member.name: T:Base62.Base62Converter.CharacterSet
member.summary: Character set to use for encoding/decoding.

member.name: F:Base62.Base62Converter.CharacterSet.DEFAULT
member.summary: Alpha numeric character set, using capital letters first before lowercase.

member.name: F:Base62.Base62Converter.CharacterSet.INVERTED
member.summary: Alpha numeric character set, using lower case letters first before uppercase.
